item.title: Exploiting XSLT Injection
item.description: Exploiting XSLT Injection After discussing some basics and use cases for XSLT, let us dive into exploiting XSLT injection vulnerabilities.

item.title: Intro to XMLT Injection
item.description: Intro to XSLT Injection eXtensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) is a language enabling the transformation of XML documents.

item.title: Exploiting SSI Injection
item.description: Exploiting SSI Injection Now that we have discussed how SSI works in the previous section, let us discuss how to exploit SSI injection.

item.title: Introduction to SSI Injection
item.description: Introduction to SSI Injection Server-Side Includes (SSI) is a technology web applications use to create dynamic content on HTML pages.

item.title: SSTI Tools
item.description: SSTI Tools of the Trade & Preventing SSTI This section will showcase tools that can help us identify and exploit SSTI vulnerabilities.

item.title: Exploiting SSTI - Twig
item.description: Exploiting SSTI - Twig In this section, we will explore another example of SSTI exploitation.

item.title: Server-Side Attacks Cheatsheet
item.description: SERVER-SIDE ATTACKS CHEAT SHEET SSRF Exploitation internal portscan by accessing ports on localhost accessing restricted endpoints Protocols http://127.0.0.1/ file:///etc/passwd gopher://dateserver.htb:80/_POST%20/admin.php%20HTTP%2F1.1%0D%0AHost:%20dateserver.htb%0D%0AContent-Length:%2013%0D%0ACont...

item.title: Exploiting SSTI - Jinja2
item.description: Exploiting SSTI - Jinja2 Now that we have seen how to identify the template engine used by a web application vulnerable to SSTI, we will move on to the exploitation of SSTI.
